about_the_game:
To battle or to be promoted, that is the question


With horns ringing, smoke in the air, the monsters are pounding the crumbling walls, and all around you are the poor recruits.
Should they be armed and rushed off to battle or should they wait to be promoted into more hardened fighters? Make your decision wisely and quickly.

Tower protection? Magic bombing? Or accumulate wealth?


Mysterious crystals and shiny gold coins are also important resources.
With their help, you can build a strong line of defense, or cast powerful spells, or make smart investments for long-term returns.

A rich variety of random elements



20+ monsters, 30+ skills, 40+arm of the services, 100+ blessings!
Different challenges and different combinations create different experiences for each game.

Just get into the adrenaline rush of thinking and directing!

name: Block Defend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10/win11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10/win11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: BlockDefend is a rougeLite tower defense game. You need to allocate the resources and build up as many advanced units as possible, to defend your town against waves of increasingly powerful monsters!
